text:
Front-end Developer - Amsterdam - Local - Startup

People's Playground is a startup in Amsterdam creating Smart-tv apps. Looking for skilled front-end developers with good angularJS and HTML5 skills. If you're an EU citizen and bored with creating regular web applications, this might be something for you.

Also hiring a Project Manager by the way. If you're interested, message me. For more info check http://www.peoplesplayground.nl
